function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of community participation in disease prevention and management","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread and outbreak within the community","Mitigation":"Promote and ensure community participation and empowerment, encourage e-reporting, and develop capabilities for handling emergencies","Technologies":"Community-controlled partnerships and intervention, e-reporting technologies","People":"Local communities, vulnerable populations","Owner":"Social welfare services, local authorities"},{"Description":"Insufficient focus on physical distancing and behavioral modification","Impact":"Higher likelihood of disease transmission and spread","Mitigation":"Facilitate physical distancing, promote behavioral modification, and encourage community participation","Technologies":"Technologies for tracking distancing, behavioral modification programs","People":"General population, vulnerable populations","Owner":"Public-private partnership, social welfare services"},{"Description":"Lack of integrated environmental and health management perspective","Impact":"Ineffective prevention and control of disease outbreaks","Mitigation":"Develop capabilities for integrated environmental and health management, ensure responsible state leadership, and promote greater participation and accountability of local communities","Technologies":"Environmental and health management technologies","People":"General population, vulnerable populations","Owner":"Health authorities, social welfare services"}]}
